sets.tps: 200 HP, 28 En, 72 M Def, 200 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP, 200 Ranged Defense, Very Clever and Heavy Shield is for Maximum Ranged Bulk 
 28 Energy = 256 Energy at level 50 for (2 Fire Breaths + 2 Peace of Minds + 1 Rejuvenate) 
 72 Melee Defense is leftovers and increases overall Bulk
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 4 En, 96 M Def, 200 R Def
sets.detail:
200 HP, 200 Ranged Defense and Very Clever is to be as Ranged Tanky as possible 
 4 Energy = 251 Energy at level 50 for (5 Fire Breaths) 
 96 Melee Defense is leftovers and increases overall Bulk
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 200 HP, 28 En, 136 M Def, 88 R Def, 48 Sp
sets.detail:
200 HP, 136 Melee Defense and Robust makes Very Brawny Tahtab Junglejutsu 3HKO 
 200 HP, 88 Ranged Defense, Clever and Heavy Shield is to increase Ranged Bulk as much as possible 
 48 Speed outspeeds anything trying to speedcreep Sluggish Stratusoar 
 28 Energy = 256 Energy at level 50 for (2 Fire Breaths + 2 Peace of Minds + 1 Rejuvenate)
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer

sets.tps: 168 HP, 28 En, 96 R Atk, 160 R Def, 48 Sp
sets.detail:
168 HP, 160 Ranged Defense, Clever and Heavy Shield makes Smart Ancient Essence Zuelong Elemental Burst 3HKO 
 48 Speed outspeeds anything trying to speedcreep Sluggish Stratusoar 
 28 Energy = 256 Energy at level 50 for (2 Fire Breaths + 2 Peace of Minds + 1 Rejuvenate) 
 96 Ranged Attack is leftovers, and with Smart, gives it a bit more offensive pressure
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
